implicitPoint2D_SSI(p1:l1x;3;32;2.221313410988302e-015;4.000000000000004;l1y;3;32;2.221313410988302e-015;4.000000000000004;d1;2;16;8.883952601346225e-016;2.000000000000001)
p2x p2y p3x p3y

t1x = p2y - p3y
t1y = p3x - p2x
e2 = l1x * t1x
e3 = l1y * t1y
e = e2 + e3
pr1 = p2x * p3y
pr2 = p2y * p3x
pr = pr1 - pr2
dpr = d1 * pr
det = dpr + e

// SIGN d1
